formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Funktion in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'QUEUE_MEMBER_PENALTY' =-
[Syntax] QUEUE_MEMBER_PENALTY(<queuename>,<interface>)
[Synopsis] Gets or sets queue members penalty.
[Description] Gets or sets queue members penalty
